characters.name: アルベド
characters.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

abilities.description: 剣による最大5段の連続攻撃を行う。
一定のスタミナを消費し、前方に斬撃を2回放つ。
空中から落下し地面に衝撃を与える。経路上の敵を攻撃し、落下時に範囲ダメージを与える。

abilities.name: 疑似陽華
abilities.description: 陽華を錬成し、岩元素範囲ダメージを与える。
descriptions: 陽華を中心とするエリア内にいる敵がダメージを受けた時、陽華は刹那の花を生成し、敵に岩元素の範囲ダメージを与える。
ダメージ量はアルベドの防御力によって決まる。刹那の花は2秒毎に1回のみ生成できる。
キャラクターが陽華の上にいる時、陽華は岩元素の力を凝結し、キャラクターを一定の高さまで持ち上げる晶台を生成する。晶台は同時に最大1つまで存在可能。アルベドによって創造された陽華は同時に最大1つまで存在可能。
陽華は岩元素創造物とみなされる。

abilities.description: スキルの発動位置を調整できる。

skills.title: 誕生式・大地の潮
skills.description: アルベドの指示の下、岩晶が激しく爆発し、アルベドの前方に岩元素範囲ダメージを与える。/nフィールド上にアルベドが創造した陽華が存在している場合、陽華のエリア内に7本の生滅の花を生成し、岩元素範囲ダメージを与える。

passives.title: 天才の気付き
passives.description: 武器突破素材を合成する時、10%の確率でアイテムを2倍獲得する。

passives.title: 白亜色の気迫
passives.description: 創生術・疑似陽華の刹那の花がHP50%以下の敵にダメージを与えた場合、ダメージ量+25%。

passives.title: ホムンクルスの天智
passives.description: 誕生式・大地の潮を発動した時、付近のチーム内キャラクターの元素熟知を+125、継続時間10秒。

constellations.title: エデンの花
constellations.description: アルベドの創生術・疑似陽華の刹那の花が放たれた時、アルベド自身の元素エネルギーが1.2回復する。

constellations.title: 顕生の宇宙
constellations.description: 創生術・疑似陽華の刹那の花が放たれた時、アルベドに生滅カウントを付与する。継続時間30秒。
constellations.secondDescription: 誕生式・大地の潮を発動する時、全ての生滅カウントを取り除く。取り除かれた数によって、誕生式・大地の潮を爆発ダメージと生滅の花のダメージが上昇する。
descriptions: 生滅カウント1つにつき、アルベドの防御力30%分のダメージが上昇する。
生滅カウントは最大4重まで。

constellations.title: 太陽の華
constellations.description: 創生術・疑似陽華のスキルLv+3。最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 聖なる墜落
constellations.description: 陽華のエリア内にいるキャラクターの落下攻撃ダメージ+30%。

constellations.title: 太古の潮
constellations.description: 誕生式・大地の潮のスキルLv+3。最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 無垢なる土
constellations.description: 陽華のエリア内にいるフィールド上のキャラクターが、結晶反応で生成されたシールド状態にある時、与えるダメージ+17%。

characters.name: アンバー
characters.description: 元気満々な女の子、騎士団で最も優秀で、最後の偵察騎士である。

abilities.description: 最高5段の連続射撃。
ダメージがより高く、より正確な狙い撃ちを発動する。照準時、烈炎を矢先に凝集させ、烈炎に満ちた矢は的に炎ダメージを与える。
空中から矢の雨を放ち、凄まじいスピードで落下し地面に衝撃を与え、落下時に範囲ダメージを与える。

abilities.name: ウサギ伯爵
descriptions: 周囲の敵を嘲笑い続け、攻撃を吸い寄せる。
耐久度はアンバーをHPの一定の比例で受け継ぐ。
破壊された時または継続時間終了したときに爆発し、炎元素範囲ダメージを与える。

abilities.description: 投擲方向を調整できる。投擲距離は長押しの時間によって増加する。

skills.title: 矢の雨
skills.description: 前方に炎の矢の雨を出し、炎元素範囲ダメージを与え続ける。

passives.title: 飛行チャンピオン
passives.description: チーム内の自身のキャラクター全員が滑翔に消費するスタミナ-20%。

passives.title: 百発百中！
passives.description: 矢の雨の会心率+10%、影響範囲+30%。キャラ突破Lv1で解放。

passives.title: 制圧射撃
passives.description: 狙い撃ちが弱点に命中すると、攻撃力+15%、継続時間10秒。キャラ突破Lv4で解放。

constellations.title: 一挙双擒
constellations.description: 狙い撃ちする時、矢を連続2本放つ。2本目の矢は元の矢の20%のダメージを与える。

constellations.title: 一触即発
constellations.description: ウサギ伯爵が改良された!フルチャージの狙い撃ちがウサギ伯爵の足に命中するとウサギ伯爵を直接起爆させられる。この形で自らウサギ伯爵を起爆させると、追加で200%のダメージを与える。

constellations.title: 燃やせ!
constellations.description: 矢の雨のスキルLv.+3。最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: ただの人形じゃない
constellations.description: 爆弾人形のクールタイム-20%、使用可能回数が1回増える。

constellations.title: ウサギ伯爵だよ!
constellations.description: 爆弾人形のスキルLv.+3。最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 野火の如く
constellations.description: 矢の雨を発動した10秒間、チーム全員の移動速度+15%、攻撃力+15%。

characters.name: 神里綾華
characters.description: 稲妻名門「神里家」のお嬢様、高貴で優雅な美しい少女。

characters.name: バーバラ
characters.description: モンドのみんなはバーバラが大好き。ちなみに「アイドル」という言葉は彼女が雑誌で見たものらしい。

abilities.description: 最大4段の連続攻撃を行い、水元素ダメージを与える。
一定のスタミナを消費し、短い詠唱をした後、敵に水元素範囲ダメージを与える。
空中から水元素の力を凝集しながら落下し、地面に衝撃を与える。経路上の敵を攻撃し、落下時に水元素範囲ダメージを与える。

skills.title: 公演、開始♪
skills.description: 躍動する歌声のような水の玉を召喚し、歌声の輪を作って周囲の敵に水元素ダメージを与え、さらに湿潤状態を付与する。

abilities.name: 歌声の輪
descriptions: バーバラの通常攻撃が命中した時、チーム内の自身のキャラクター全員または付近の味方のHPを回復する。回復量はバーバラのHP上限によって決まる。
重撃が命中した時、回復量は4倍になる。
一定時間の間隔で、出場している自身のキャラクターのHPを回復する。
キャラクター、または接触した敵に湿潤状態を付与する。

skills.title: シャイニングミラクル♪
skills.description: 周囲にいる味方とチーム内の自身のキャラクター全員のHPを大量に回復する。回復量はバーバラのHP上限を基準とする。

passives.title: 気持ち♪注入
passives.description: 回復系料理を完璧調理した時、12%の確率で料理を2倍獲得する。

passives.title: 輝く季節
passives.description: 公演、開始歌声の輪が継続している間、スタミナ消費-12%。

passives.title: アンコール
passives.description: 出場している自身のキャラクターが元素オーブまたは元素粒子を獲得した時、公演、開始の歌声の輪の継続時間+1秒。この方法で最大5秒まで延長可能。

constellations.title: 虹色の歌
constellations.description: 10秒毎に元素エネルギーを1回復する。

constellations.title: 元気溌剌
constellations.description: 公演、開始のクールタイム－15％。スキル継続中、出場している自身のキャラクターの与える水元素ダメージ+15％。

constellations.title: 明日の星
constellations.description: シャイニングミラクルのスキルLv.+3。最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 努力が魔法なの
constellations.description: 重撃が敵に命中する度に、バーバラの元素エネルギーが1回復する。一回で最大元素エネルギーが5まで回復できる。

constellations.title: 純真な絆
constellations.description: 公演、開始のスキルLv.+3。最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 美しいものをあなたに
constellations.description: バーバラ待機中にチーム内の自身のキャラクターが戦闘不能になると、下記の効果が発動される:
constellations.secondDescription: この効果は15分毎に1回のみ発動可能。
descriptions: 戦闘不能になったキャラクターを復活させる
該当キャラクターのHPが100%回復される。

characters.name: 北斗
characters.description: 武装船隊「南十字」の頭領、豪快な姉貴。

abilities.description: 最大5段の連続攻撃を行う。
持続的にスタミナを消費し、素早く連続攻撃を発動する。重撃が終了した時に、更に強力な攻撃を1回放つ。
空中から落下し地面に衝撃を与える。経路上の敵を攻撃し、落下時に範囲ダメージを与える。

skills.title: 浪追い
skills.description: 雷の力を凝集させ、前方に大剣を振り、雷元素ダメージを与える。

abilities.description: 武器をシールドとして使う、ダメージ吸収量は北斗のHP上限によって決まる。/n手放すまたはスキル継続時間終了時、大剣を振り回して攻撃を行い、雷元素ダメージを与える。
スキル期間中に受けた攻撃の回数により、与えるダメージを最大2回までアップさせる。/nシールドには下記の効果がある。:
descriptions: 雷元素ダメージに対して250%の吸収効果がある。
スキル発動時、北斗に雷元素付着効果を付与する。

skills.title: 雷斫り
skills.description: 巨獣海山との戦いを思い出した北斗は、巨獣と雷電の力を召喚し、雷獣の盾を作り、周囲の敵に雷元素ダメージを与える。

abilities.name: 雷獣の盾
descriptions: 通常攻撃と重撃が近距離の敵に命中すると、雷の力で敵の間を跳躍する稲妻を発生させ、敵に雷元素ダメージを与える。
キャラクターの中断耐性をアップさせ、受けるダメージを軽減する。
稲妻発生の効果は1秒に1回のみ。

passives.title: 怒濤踏み
passives.description: チーム内の自身のキャラクター全員が泳ぎに消費するスタミナ-20%。

passives.title: 完全なる霊光
passives.description: 攻撃された瞬間に発動した浪追いの反撃は最大ダメージアップ効果を得る。

passives.title: 満天の霹靂
passives.description: 最大ダメージアップ効果のある浪追いを発動した後の10秒間、下記の効果が発動される:
descriptions: 通常攻撃と重撃の攻撃速度+15%、攻撃ダメージ+15%。
重撃に必要な時間が大幅に減少する。

constellations.title: 四方に沈む魚龍
constellations.description: 雷斫り発動時:
descriptions: HP上限16%相当のシールドを15秒間発動する。
該当シールドは雷元素ダメージに対して250%の吸収効果がある。

constellations.title: 沸き上がる雷
constellations.description: 雷斫りの稲妻が2体の敵を追加で攻撃可能になる。

constellations.title: 雷引きの潮
constellations.description: 浪追いのスキルLv.+3。最大15Lv.まで。

constellations.title: 星に導かれた岸線
constellations.description: 攻撃を受けた後の10秒間、北斗の通常攻撃に追加で20%の雷元素ダメージが付与される。

constellations.title: 白波に映る霞光
constellations.description: 雷斫りのスキルLv.+3。最大15Lv.まで。

constellations.title: 北斗の祓い
constellations.description: 雷斫り継続中、周囲の敵の雷元素耐性-15%

characters.name: ベネット
characters.description: モンドの冒険者少年、その優しさとそぐわない不運を持っている。

abilities.description: 剣による最大5段の連続攻撃。
一定のスタミナを消費し、前方に2回斬撃する。
空中から落下し地面に衝撃を与える。経路上の敵を攻撃し、落下時に範囲ダメージを与える。

skills.title: 溢れる情熱
skills.description: ベネットが炎元素と冒険への情熱を剣に込めて⋯込めた情熱の多さによって、違う効果が現れる可能性がある。

abilities.description: 前方に素早く炎の一撃を仕掛け、炎ダメージを与える。
長押しでチャージし、チャージ段数により効果が変わる。
abilities.secondDescription: 自身と敵を同時にノックバックする。ベネットがこれによりノックバックされた時、ダメージを受けることはない
descriptions: 1段チャージ:二段攻撃を仕掛け、炎ダメージを与え、敵をノックバックする。
2段チャージ:三段攻撃を発動し、大量の炎ダメージを与え、最後の一撃に爆発が発生し、自身と敵を同時にノックバックする。

skills.title: 素晴らしい旅
skills.description: ベネットが敵の方にジャンプし、落下攻撃を仕掛け、炎ダメージを与え鼓舞エリアを生成する。

abilities.name: 鼓舞エリアは以下の特性を持つ
descriptions: エリア内のキャラのHPが最大値の70%を下回ると、HPが継続回復する。回復量はベネットのHP上限によって決まる。
エリア内のキャラのHPが最大値の70%以上の場合、ベネットの基礎攻撃力を基準に、一定比例の攻撃力がアップする。
エリア内のキャラに炎元素付着効果を付与する。

passives.title: 多分安全
passives.description: モンドの探索任務の所要時間-25%。

passives.title: 情熱復活
passives.description: 溢れる情熱のクールタイム-20%。

passives.title: 恐れなき熱血
passives.description: 素晴らしい旅エリア内にいると、溢れる情熱が以下の効果を持つ:
descriptions: クールタイム-50%
2段チャージによるベネット自身のノックバックは発生しない。

constellations.title: 冒険の憧れ
constellations.description: 「素晴らしい旅」の攻撃力アップ効果はHPによる制限がなくなり、更にベネットの基礎攻撃力の20%に当たる数値を追加。

constellations.title: 絶境踏破
constellations.description: HPが70％以下になると、元素チャージ効率+30％。

constellations.title: 炎のような情熱
constellations.description: 溢れる情熱のスキルLv.3、最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 消えない情熱
constellations.description: 1段チャージ溢れる情熱を発動する時、二段目攻撃中に通常攻撃をすると追加攻撃を発動できる。二段目攻撃の135％の追加ダメージを与える。

constellations.title: 開拓の心意気
constellations.description: 素晴らしい旅のスキルLv.3、最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 烈火と勇気
constellations.description: 素晴らしい旅エリア内の片手剣、両手剣、長柄武器キャラの炎ダメージ+15％、通常攻撃と重撃ダメージを炎ダメージに変換する。

characters.name: 重雲
characters.description: 妖魔退治一族の方士少年、自身の「純陽の体」を抑えるためにいろいろ苦労している。

abilities.description: 最大4段の連続攻撃を行う。
継続的にスタミナを消費し、大剣を振り回し周囲の敵を攻撃する。斬撃が終了した時に、更に強力な攻撃を1回放つ。
空中から落下し地面に衝撃を与える。経路上の敵を攻撃し、落下時に範囲ダメージを与える。

skills.title: 霊刃・重華積霜
skills.description: 重雲が巨大な剣を振って地面を叩き、前方の円形範囲内に氷爆を発動し、敵に氷元素ダメージを与える。その後、氷爆による寒気が重華積霜エリアになり、エリア内の片手剣、大剣、長柄武器キャラの通常攻撃、重撃と落下攻撃ダメージは氷元素ダメージになる。

skills.title: 霊刃・雲開星落
skills.description: 重雲が印を結び、前方の空中に3本の巨大霊刃を召喚する。霊刃は短時間内に1本ずつ地面に落ちて爆裂する。霊刃が爆裂時、氷元素範囲ダメージを与え、敵を吹き飛ばす。

passives.title: 雲遊山海
passives.description: 璃月の探索任務の所要時間が25%短縮する。

passives.title: 吐納真定
passives.description: 霊刃・重華積霜エリア内にいる時、片手剣、両手剣、長柄武器キャラの通常攻撃と攻撃速度が8%上昇する。

passives.title: 追氷剣訣
passives.description: 霊刃・重華積霜エリアが消えた時、自動的に付近の敵を攻撃する霊刃を召喚し、霊刃・重華積霜のスキルダメージ100%の氷範囲ダメージを与える。命中された敵の氷耐性が10%減少する、継続時間8秒。

constellations.title: 釈凌詠氷
constellations.description: 通常攻撃の最後の一撃が前方に3つの氷の刃を放ち、氷の刃は途中の敵に重雲の50%攻撃力の氷ダメージを与える。

constellations.title: 周天の回転
constellations.description: 霊刃・重華積霜エリア内、元素スキルと元素爆発のクールタイムが15%減少する。

constellations.title: 浮雲霜天
constellations.description: 重雲のすべての攻撃が氷元素の影響を受けた敵に命中した時、自身の元素エネルギーを1回復。この効果は2秒毎に1回のみ発動可能。

constellations.title: 真道の正理
constellations.description: 霊刃・重華積霜のスキルLv.+3。最大Lv.15まで。

constellations.title: 四霊の捧げ
constellations.description: HPの割合が重雲より低い敵に霊刃・雲開星落が命中した時、ダメージ+15%。また、スキル発動時さらに追加で霊刃を1本を召喚する。

constellations.title: 雲の果てに光あり
constellations.description: 霊刃・雲開星落のスキルLv.+3。最大Lv.15まで。

characters.name: Diluc
characters.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

abilities.description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Searing Onslaught
skills.description: Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG. This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.

skills.title: Dawn
skills.description: Releases intense flames to knock nearby enemies back, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG. The searing flames that run down his blade cause Diluc’s Normal and Charged Attacks to deal Pyro DMG for a time.

passives.title: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

passives.title: Relentless
passives.description: Diluc’s Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passives.title: Blessing of Phoenix
passives.description: The Pyro Enchantment provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

constellations.title: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to enemies whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.title: Searing Ember
constellations.description: When Diluc takes DMG, his Base ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s. This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.title: Steel and Fire
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Flowing Flame
constellations.description: Casting Searing Onslaught in sequence greatly increases damage dealt. Within 2s of using Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for the next 2s.

constellations.title: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description: Increases the level of Dawn by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of Dark
constellations.description: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%. Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

characters.name: Diona
characters.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredible popular bartender of the Cat’s Tail tavern.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost accumulates on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Icy Paws
skills.description: Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield’s DMG Absorption scales based on Diona’s Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.

abilities.description: Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.

Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws. The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus. The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.

skills.title: Signature Mix
skills.description: Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.

abilities.name: Drunken Mist
descriptions: Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE.
Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.

passives.title: Complimentary Bar Food
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Cat’s Tail Secret Menu
passives.description: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passives.title: Drunkard’s Farce
passives.description: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

constellations.title: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

constellations.title: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.description: Increases Icy Paws’ DMG by 15%, and increases its shield’s DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield’s DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.title: A-Another Round?
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.description: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona’s charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%.

constellations.title: Double Shot, On The Rocks
constellations.description: Increases the level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Cat’s Tail Closing Time
constellations.description: Characters within Signature Mix’s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
descriptions: Increasing Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
Elemental Mastery is increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

characters.name: Eula
characters.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

abilities.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG.
When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s.

abilities.name: Grimheart
abilities.description: Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF.

Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her.
If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased.
Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents.

skills.title: Glacial Illumination
skills.description:
Brandishes her greatsword, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s.
While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s.
Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents.
This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated.
If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will explode immediately.

passives.title: Aristocratic Introspection
passives.description: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

passives.title: Roiling Rime
passives.description: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Holding Mode of Icetide Vortex, a Shattered Lightfall Sword will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by Glacial Illumination.

passives.title: Wellspring of War-Lust
passives.description: When Glacial Illumination is cast, the CD of Icetide Vortex is reset and Eula gains 1 stack of Grimheart.

constellations.title: Tidal Illusion
constellations.description:
Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

constellations.title: Lady of Seafoam
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of Icetide Vortex's Holding Mode, rendering it identical to {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} CD.

constellations.title: Lawrence Pedigree
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Glacial Illumination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
constellations.description: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

constellations.title: Chivalric Quality
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Noble Obligation
constellations.description: Lightfall Swords created by Glacial Illumination start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

characters.name: Fischl
characters.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessia der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsuchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Nightrider
skills.description: Summons Oz, the night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE. For the ability’s duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby enemies with Freikugel. Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to. Press again any time during the ability’s duration to once again summon him to Fischl’s side.

skills.title: Midnight Phantasmagoria
skills.description: Summons Oz to spread his twin swings of twilight and defend Fischl. Has the following properties during the ability’s duration:

descriptions: Fischl takes on Oz’s form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
Strikes nearby enemies with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to enemies she comes into contact with. Each enemy can only be struck once.
Once this ability’s effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin’s foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.

passives.title: Mein Hausgarten
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.title: Stellar Predator
passives.description: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow’s DMG.

passives.title: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
passives.description: If a character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the enemy shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl’s ATK.

constellations.title: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.description: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl attacks an enemy, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing 22% of ATK DMG.

constellations.title: Devourer of All-Sins
constellations.description: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.title: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.description: When Midnight Phatasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding enemies. When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.title: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Evernight Raven
constellations.description: Increases the duration of Oz’s summoning by 2s. Additionally, Oz attacks with the current character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl’s ATK as Electro DMG.

characters.name: Ganyu
characters.description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

abilities.description: Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, an icy aura will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged:
descriptions: Charge Level 1: Fires off an icy arrow that deals Cryo DMG.
Charge Level 2: Fires off a Frostflake Arrow that deals Cryo DMG. The Frostflake Arrow blooms after hitting its target, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Trail of the Qilin
skills.description: Leaving a single Ice Lotus behind, Ganyu dashes backward, shunning all impurity and dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Ice Lotus
descriptions: Continuously taunts surrounding opponents, attracting them to attack it.
Endurance scales based on Ganyu's Max HP.
Blooms profusely when destroyed or once its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

skills.title: Celestial Shower
skills.description:
Coalesces atmospheric frost and snow to summon a Sacred Cryo Pearl that exorcises evil.
 During its ability duration, the Sacred Cryo Pearl will continuously rain down shards of ice, striking opponents within an AoE and dealing Cryo DMG.

passives.title: Preserved for the Hunt
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Bow-type weapons.

passives.title: Undivided Heart
passives.description: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, the CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their resulting bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.

passives.title: Harmony between Heaven and Earth
passives.description: Celestial Shower grants a 20% Cryo DMG Bonus to active party members in the AoE.

constellations.title: Dew-Drinker
constellations.description:
Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s.
 A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.title: The Auspicious
constellations.description: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.title: Cloud-Strider
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Westward Sojourn
constellations.description:
Opponents standing within the AoE of Celestial Shower take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.title: The Merciful
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: The Clement
constellations.description: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

characters.name: Hu Tao
characters.description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

abilities.description: Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Guide to Afterlife
skills.description:
Only an unwavering flame can cleanse the impurities of this world.
Hu Tao consumes a set portion of her HP to knock the surrounding enemies back and enter the Paramita Papilio state.

abilities.name: Paramita Papilio
descriptions: Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK.
Converts attack DMG to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to the enemies hit.
Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption.

abilities.name: Blood Blossom
abilities.description:
Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself.
Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen.

skills.title: Spirit Soother
skills.description:
Commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing Pyro DMG in a large AoE.
Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times, based on the number of enemies hit.
If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased.

passives.title: The More the Merrier
passives.description: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

passives.title: Flutter By
passives.description: When a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.

passives.title: Sanguine Rouge
passives.description: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her Pyro DMG Bonus is increased by 33%.

constellations.title: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.description: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

constellations.title: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.description:
Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

constellations.title: Lingering Carmine
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.description: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

constellations.title: Floral Incense
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.description: Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
descriptions: Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

characters.name: Jean
characters.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius in Mondstadt.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to launch an enemy using the power of wind. Launched enemies will slowly fall to the ground.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Gale Blade
skills.description: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching enemies in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.

abilities.description: At the cost of continued Stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding enemies towards her front. Direction can be adjusted. Character is immobile during skill duration.

skills.title: Dandelion Breeze
skills.description: Calling upon the wind’s protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding enemies and causing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for nearby allied units and all party members. HP restored scale off Jean’s ATK.

abilities.name: Dandelion Field
descriptions: Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo.
Deals Anemo DMG to enemies entering or exiting the field.

passives.title: Guiding Breeze
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Wind Companion
passives.description: Hits by Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean’s ATK for all party members.

passives.title: Let the Wind Lead
passives.description: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

constellations.title: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.description: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.title: People’s Aegis
constellations.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.title: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.description: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all enemies have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

constellations.title: Outbursting Gust
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Gale Blade by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Lion’s Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

characters.name: Kaeya
characters.description: A thinker in the Knights of Favonius with a somewhat exotic appearance.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemeies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Frostgnaw
skills.description: Unleashes a frigit blast, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in front of Kaeya.

skills.title: Glacial Waltz
skills.description: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him. These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to enemies in their path for so long as they persist.

passives.title: Hidden Strength
passives.description: Decreases all party member’s sprinting Stamina consumption by 20%.

passives.title: Cold-Blooded Strike
passives.description: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of ATK.

passives.title: Heart of the Abyss
passives.description: Enemies Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles. Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

constellations.title: Excellent Blood
constellations.description: The CRIT Rate of Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG against enemies affected by the Cold or Frozen status effects is increased by 15%.

constellations.title: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.description: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an enemy, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.title: Dance of Frost
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Frozen Kiss
constellations.description: Triggers automatically when Kaeya’s HP falls below 20%:
descriptions: Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya’s Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency. Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.title: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.description: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

characters.name: Keqing
characters.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Has much to say about Rex Lapis’ unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue - but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemeies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Stellar Restoration
skills.description: Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her enemies like the swift thunder. When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to enemies in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.

abilities.description: Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown. Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.

abilities.name: Lightning Stiletto
abilities.description: If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:
descriptions: If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleashed one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark’s location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.

skills.title: Starward Sword
skills.description: Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AoE. She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby enemies simultaneous that deal multiple instance of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.

passives.title: Land’s Overseer
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.title: Thundering Penance
passives.description: Within 5s of recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing’s Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Electro DMG.

passives.title: Aristocratic Dignity
passives.description: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing’s CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

constellations.title: Thundering Might
constellations.description: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.title: Keen Extraction
constellations.description: When Keqing’s Normal and Charged Attack’s hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Forseen Reformation
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Attunement
constellations.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.title: Beckoning Stars
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Tenacious Star
constellations.description: When initiating a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

characters.name: Klee
characters.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius’ confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

abilities.description: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals Pyro DMG to enemies after a short casting time.
Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.description: Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun! When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce. On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines. The mines will explode upon contact with enemies, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Starts with 2 charges.

skills.title: Sparks ’n’ Splash
skills.description: Klee’s Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks ’n’ Splash to attack nearby enemies, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

passives.title: All Of My Treasures!
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

passives.title: Pounding Surprise
passives.description: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

passives.title: Sparkling Burst
passives.description: When a Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

constellations.title: Chained Reaction
constellations.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon a spark that bombards enemies, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks ’n’ Splash’s DMG.

constellations.title: Explosive Frags
constellations.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty’s mines decreases enemy DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.title: Exquisite Compound
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks ’n’ Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.title: Nova Burst
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Sparks ’n’ Splash by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Blazing Delight
constellations.description: While under the effects of Sparks ’n’ Splash, other members of the party will continuously regenerate Energy. When Sparks ’n’ Splash is used, all party members will gain 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

characters.name: Lisa
characters.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius who was deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguised graduate in the past two centuries.

abilities.description: Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Violet Arc
skills.description: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.

abilities.description: Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to enemies in a small AoE.

After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby enemies. Deals great amounts of extra damage to enemies based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.

skills.title: Lightning Rose
skills.description: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding enemies and dealing Electro DMG. The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back enemies and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.

passives.title: General Pharmaceutics
passives.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

passives.title: Induced Aftershock
passives.description: Hits by charged Attacks apply Violet Arc’s Conductive status to enemies.

passives.title: Static Electricity Field
passives.description: Enemies hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.title: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description: Lisa recovers 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc. A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.title: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.description: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
descriptions: Increases DEF by 25%.
Increases Lisa’s resistance to interruption.

constellations.title: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

constellations.title: Electrocute
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Violet Arc by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc’s Conductive status onto nearby enemies. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

characters.name: Mona
characters.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title.

abilities.description: Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Mirror Reflection of Doom
skills.description: Creates an illusory Phantom of fate from coalesced waterspouts.

abilities.description: The Phantom has the following special properties:
descriptions: Continuously taunts nearby enemies, attracting their fire.
Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby enemies.
When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

abilities.description: Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom. Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.

skills.title: Stellaris Phantasm
skills.description: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE.

abilities.name: Illusory Bubble
abilities.description: Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile. When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, the following effects are produced:
descriptions: Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it.
Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro Elemental DMG in the process. The DMG Bonus does not apply to the Hydro Elemental DMG dealt in this instance.

abilities.name: Omen
abilities.description: During its duration, increases DMG taken by enemies.

abilities.name: Alternate Spirit
abilities.description: Mona cloaks herself within the water’s flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly. When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water. Applies the Wet status to nearby enemies when she reappears.

passives.title: Principium of Astrology
passives.description: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

passives.title: Come ’n’ Get Me, Hag!
passives.description: After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any enemies nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom. A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.

passives.title: Waterborne Destiny
passives.description: Increases Mona’s Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

constellations.title: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.description: The effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s after a character hits an enemy affected by an Omen:
descriptions: Electro-Charged DMG is increased by 15%.
Vaporize DMG is increased by 15%.
Hydro Swirl DMG is increased by 15%.
The duration for which enemies are Frozen is increased by 15%.

constellations.title: Lunar Chain
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Restless Revolution
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.description: When a character attacks an enemy affected by the Omen status effect, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.title: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.description: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gain a 60% increase to the DMG her next Charged Attack per second of movement. A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

characters.name: Ningguang
characters.description: The Tianquan of Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

abilities.description: Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG. If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.
Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Jade Screen
skills.description: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG.

abilities.name: Jade Screen
abilities.description: Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.
descriptions: Blocks enemy projectiles.
Endurance scales based on Ningguang’s Max HP.

skills.title: Starshatter
skills.description: Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her enemies that deal massive Geo DMG. If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

passives.title: Trove of Marvelous Treasure
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby ore veins (Iron Ore, White Iron Ore, Crystal Ore, and Magical Crystal Ore) on the mini-map.

passives.title: Backup Plan
passives.description: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

passives.title: Strategic Reserve
passives.description: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.title: Piercing Fragments
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.title: Shock Effect
constellations.description: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset. Can occur once every 6s.

constellations.title: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All the Beneath
constellations.description: Jade Screen increases nearby characters’ Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.title: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Jade Screen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.description: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

characters.name: Noelle
characters.description: A maid in the service of the Knights of Favonius that dreams of joining their ranks someday.

abilities.description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies. At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Breastplate
skills.description: Summons a protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding enemies and creating a shield. The shield’s DMG Absorption scaled based on Noelle’s DEF.

abilities.description: The shield has the following properties:
descriptions: When Noelle’s Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters, both on and off the field. The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle’s DEF.
Applies the Geo element to the character.
Possesses 150% Absorption Efficiency against Geo DMG.

skills.title: Sweeping Time
skills.description: Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the enemies surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG.

abilities.description: Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
descriptions: Larger attack AoE.
Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG.
Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.

passives.title: Maid’s Knighthood
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Devotion
passives.description: When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when the active character’s HP falls below 30%: Creates a shield that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle’s DEF. This effect can only occur once every 60s.

passives.title: Nice and Clean
passives.description: Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s. Hitting multiple enemies with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

constellations.title: I Got Your Back
constellations.description: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate’s healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.title: Combat Maid
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle’s Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.title: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: To Be Cleaned
constellations.description: When Breastplate’s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding enemies.

constellations.title: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Sweeping Time by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Must Be Spotless
constellations.description: Sweeping Time increases Noelle’s ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF. Additionally, every enemy defeated during the skill’s duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

characters.name: Qiqi
characters.description: An apprentice and herb-picker Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
skills.description: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Herald of Frost
descriptions: When Qiqi hits a target with her Normal or Charged Attacks, she regenerates HP for all party members and all nearby allied characters. Healing scales based on Qiqi’s ATK.
Regenerates HP for current character at regular intervals.
Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in its path.

skills.title: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
skills.description: Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby enemies with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Fortune-Preserving Talisman
abilities.description: When enemies affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.

passives.title: Former Life Memories
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

passives.title: Life-Prolonging Methods
passives.description: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

passives.title: A Glimpse into Arcanum
passives.description: When Qiqi hits enemies with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

constellations.title: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.description: When the Herald of Frost hits an enemy marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.title: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.description: Qiqi’s Normal and Charge Attack DMG against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.title: Ascendant Praise
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Divine Suppression
constellations.description: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.title: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.description: Using Adeptus Art: Preserve of Fortune revives all nearby fallen characters and regenerates 50% of their HP. This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

characters.name: Razor
characters.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

abilities.description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies. At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Claw and Thunder
skills.description: Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his Lupical.

abilities.description: Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to enemies in front of Razor. Upon striking an enemy, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate. Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.

Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor’s Electro Sigils. Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.

skills.title: Lightning Fang
skills.description: Summons the Wolf Within which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor’s Electro Sigils, which will be converted into elemental energy for him. The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill’s duration.

abilities.name: The Wolf Within
abilities.description: These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield. When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.
descriptions: Strikes alongside Razor’s normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
Raises Razor’s ATK SPD and Electro RES.
Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status.
Disables Razor’s Charged Attacks.
Increases Razor's resistance to interruption.

passives.title: Wolvensprint
passives.description: Decreases all party member’s sprinting Stamina Consumption by 20%.

passives.title: Awakening
passives.description: Decreases Claw and Thunder’s CD by 18%. Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

passives.title: Hunger
passives.description: When Razor’s Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

constellations.title: Wolf’s Instinct
constellations.description: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor’s DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.title: Suppression
constellations.description: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.title: Soul Companion
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Bite
constellations.description: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.title: Sharpened Claws
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.description: Every 10s, Razor’s sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor’s ATK as Electro DMG. When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an enemy will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.

characters.name: Rosaria
characters.description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

abilities.description: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Ravaging Confession
skills.description:
Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing Cyro DMG.
This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build.

skills.title: Rites of Termination
skills.description:
Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal Cryo DMG.
While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents.

passives.title: Night Walk
passives.description:
At night (18:00–6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Regina Probationum
passives.description: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using Ravaging Confession, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

passives.title: Shadow Samaritan
passives.description:
Casting Rites of Termination increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.
CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

constellations.title: Unholy Revelation
constellations.description: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.title: Land Without Promise
constellations.description: The duration of the Ice Lance created by Rites of Termination is increased by 4s.

constellations.title: The Wages of Sin
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Ravaging Confessionby 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Painful Grace
constellations.description: Ravaging Confession's Crit Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria. Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

constellations.title: Last Rites
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Rites of Termination by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Divine Retribution
constellations.description: Rites of Termination' attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

characters.name: Sucrose
characters.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

abilities.description: Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.
Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
skills.description: Creates a small Wind Spirit that deals Anemo DMG to enemies in an AoE, pulling them towards the location of the Wind Spirit before launching them.

skills.title: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
skills.description: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull and launch nearby enemies, dealing AoE Anemo DMG.

abilities.description: If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro / Pyro / Cryo / Electro elements, it will deal additional DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Astable Invention
passives.description: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Catalyst Conversion
passives.description: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, characters in the party with the matching element have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

passives.title: Mollis Favonius
passives.description: When Astable Anemohypostatis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hit an enemy, increases other party member’s Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose’s Elemental Mastery for 8s.

constellations.title: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.description: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.title: Beth - Unbound Form
constellations.description: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

constellations.title: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Alchemania
constellations.description: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.

constellations.title: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.description: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

characters.name: Tartaglia
characters.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe". His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

abilities.description: Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal Hydro DMG and apply Riptide status..

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from AoE Hydro DMG effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG.
descriptions: Riptide Flash: A fully-charged Aimed Shot that hits an opponent affected by Riptide deals consecutive bouts of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 0.7s.
Riptide Burst: Defeating an opponent affected by Riptide created a Hydro burst that inflicts the Riptide status on nearby opponents hit.

abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact. When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide’s Melee Stance, he cannot perform a plunging attack.

skills.title: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
skills.description: Unleashes a set of weaponry made of pure water, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and entering a Melee Stance. In this Stance, Tartaglia’s Normal and Charged Attacks change as follows:

abilities.description: Performs up to 6 consecutive Hydro strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a cross slash, dealing Hydro DMG.

abilities.name: Riptide Slash
abilities.description: Hitting an opponent affected by Riptide with a melee attack unleashes a Riptide Slash that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG, and can only occur once every 1.5s. After 30s, or when the ability is unleashed again, this skill will end. Tartaglia will return to his Ranged Stance and this ability will enter CD. The longer Tartaglia stays in his Melee Stance, the longer the CD. If the return to a ranged stance occurs automatically after 30s, the CD is even longer.

skills.title: Havor: Obliteration
skills.description: Performs different attacks based on what stance Tartaglia is in when casting.

abilities.name: Ranged Stance: Flash of Havoc
abilities.description: Swiftly fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and applying the Riptide status. Returns a portion of its Energy Cost after use.

abilities.name: Melee Stance: Light Obliteration
abilities.description: Performs a slash with a large AoE, dealing massive Hydro DMG to all surrounding opponents, which triggers Riptide Blast.

abilities.name: Riptide Blast
abilities.description: When the obliterating waters hit an opponent affected by Riptide, it clears their Riptide status and triggers a Hydro Explosion that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

passives.title: Master of Weaponry
passives.description: Increases your own party member’s Normal Attack Level by 1.

passives.title: Never Ending
passives.description: Extends Riptide duration by 8s.

passives.title: Sword of Torrents
passives.description: When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide’s Melee Stance, or if his Normal and Charged Attacks do CRIT DMG, they will apply the Riptide status effect on the hit enemy.

constellations.title: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 20%.

constellations.title: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.description: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.title: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.description: If Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide’s Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash. Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.title: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Havoc: Obliteration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.description: When Havoc: Obliteration is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide is reset. This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

characters.name: Traveler (Anemo)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Palm Vortex
skills.description: Grasping the wind’s might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to enemies in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

abilities.description: DMG and AoE will gradually increase
If the vortex comes in contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

skills.title: Gust Surge
skills.description: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

abilities.description: If the tornado comes in contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Slitting Wind
passives.description: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passives.title: Second Wind
passives.description: Palm Vortex kills renegerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Raging Vortex
constellations.description: Palm Vortex pulls in enemies within a 5m radius.

constellations.title: Uprising Whirlwind
constellations.description: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

constellations.title: Sweeping Gust
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.description: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

constellations.title: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Palm Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Intertwined Winds
constellations.description: Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

characters.name: Traveler (Geo)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Starfell Sword
skills.description: You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG. The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.

abilities.description: The skill’s positioning may be adjusted.

skills.title: Wake of Earth
skills.description: Energizing the Geo elements deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves. Launches surrounding enemies back and deals AoE Geo DMG. A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave. The stone wall is considered a Geo Construct, and may be used to block attacks.

passives.title: Shattered Darkrock
passives.description: Reduces Starfell Sword’s CD by 2s.

passives.title: Frenzied Rockslide
passives.description: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as AoE Geo DMG.

constellations.title: Invincible Stonewall
constellations.description: Allies within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

constellations.title: Rockcore Meltdown
constellations.description: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

constellations.title: Will of the Rock
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Reaction Force
constellations.description: The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every enemy hit. A maximum of 25 Energy can be recovered in this manner at any one time.

constellations.title: Meteorite Impact
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Starfell Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Everlasting Boulder
constellations.description: The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer. The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.

characters.name: Venti
characters.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city’s streets and alleys.

abilities.description: Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged arrow will deal Anemo DMG.
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Skyward Sonnet
skills.description: O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!

abilities.description: Summons a Wind Domain at the enemy’s location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.

Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected enemies into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Enemies hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

skills.title: Wind’s Grand Ode
skills.description: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in objects and enemies along its path, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

abilities.description: If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Windrider
passives.description: Decreases all party member’s gliding Stamina Consumption by 20%.

passives.title: Embrace of Winds
passives.description: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

passives.title: Stormeye
passives.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind’s Grand Ode end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

constellations.title: Splitting Gale
constellations.description: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow’s DMG.

constellations.title: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.description: Skyward Sonnet decreases enemy Anemo RES by 12% for 10s. Enemies launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.title: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Wind’s Grand Ode by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.title: Concierto dal Cielo
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Storm of Defiance
constellations.description: Targets who take DMG from Wind’s Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

characters.name: Xiangling
characters.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She’s extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Guoba Attack
skills.description: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

skills.title: Pyronado
skills.description: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for so long as the ability persists, dealing Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.

passives.title: Chef de Cuisine
passives.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

passives.title: Crossfire
passives.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passives.title: Beware, It’s Super Hot!
